page.description: Returns the MIME type of the given file name.

discussion.p: Context.ResolveMimeType(filename as C) returns the MIME type of the given file name.
The filename parameter can be a full file name, or only an extension.

page.example:
'Place this code in <%a5 %> tags on an .a5w page ?Context.ResolveMimeType("index.html") + "
" ?Context.ResolveMimeType(".json") + "
" 'The output will be 'text/html 'application/json
